content.question: Capture and paste two program code segments you developed. The first program code segment must contain a student-developed procedure that implements an algorithm used in your program.

frqParts.text: Capture and paste two program code segments you developed. The first program code segment must contain a student-developed procedure that implements an algorithm used in your program.
The second program code segment must show a call to the procedure.

Provide a written response that: (Approx. 100 words, exclusive of program code) describes in general what the identified procedure does and how it contributes to the overall functionality of the program.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Use abstraction to manage complexity in a program.
